body:
Hello once again,

I am making this thread today because I want to know why Avicus gives players so many chances when that player should be Permanently Banned from the Avicus Network.  
 

 
 
As you can see this player, who will remain anonymous, was given many chances to stop being rude and to be nice to others and still continued to do this rude behavior and will be able to join the servers again on July 27th. This player should have been permanently banned a long time ago, but this player will be able to come back onto the servers and probably break the rules again. IMO it should be warn -> kick -> temp ban -> perma ban no matter how long the last punishment has been because they did learn from that mistake. Something needs to be done about this.

replies.body: You shouldn't feel bad or conflicted whenever you give out a punishment. Let's say that you saw a person being rude to someone and they have multiple temp bans in the past three months on their record for being rude. What would you do? You would permanently ban that person because of there history, no matter how small the punishment is. That's how I feel it should be because just giving out temp bans and then allowing the player to come on again and be rude to other people isn't right.
